snippet: Mable Moody, who cares for two grandsons, saw them suffer when budget cuts led to a program’s end. She responded by becoming an advocate for more funding.
abstract: Campaign for Children, coalition led by Children's Aid Society, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Mable Moody of Harlem pay for clothing and transportation for her grandchildren.
lead_paragraph: Mable Moody, who cares for two grandsons, saw them suffer when budget cuts led to a program’s end. She responded by becoming an advocate for more funding.

headline.print_headline: When Boys Lose a Haven, a Grandmother Gets Vocal
headline.main: When Boys Lose a Haven, a Grandmother Gets Vocal
